DOC.brief_summary: This study determine whether glucose facilitates memory healthy elderly people Parkinson 's disease .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Study Effects Glucose Cognition Healthy Young Elderly People Parkinson 's Disease Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects fast 8 hour receive test determine blood glucose level . Following test , subject randomize receive either glucose saccharin sweeten drink . A series memory test additional 3 blood glucose level test administer approximately 15 minute later . A minimum 1 week afterward , subject return receive alternate sweetener follow additional memory test .
DOC.criteria: Three group subject eligible study : Healthy young adult age 18 30 ; Healthy elderly adult age 60 90 ; AND Anyone diagnose Parkinson 's disease Prior surgery remove part stomach Diabetes , Addison 's , Cushing 's disease
